publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-447 Nicola Sturgeon: Commissioner for Children and Young People—That the Parliament calls for the establishment of the post of Commissioner for Children and Young People to act as an impartial advocate of children’s rights, to ensure the implementation and systematic monitoring of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child, and to consider legislation and policy from the perspective of children and young people. Supported by: Fiona McLeod*

S1M-447 Nicola Sturgeon: Commissioner for Children and Young People—That the Parliament calls for the establishment of the post of Commissioner for Children and Young People to act as an impartial advocate of children’s rights, to ensure the implementation and systematic monitoring of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child, and to consider legislation and policy from the perspective of children and young people. Supported by: Fiona McLeod
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Andrew Wilson*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Alex Neil*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-447 Nicola Sturgeon: Commissioner for Children and Young People—That the Parliament calls for the establishment of the post of Commissioner for Children and Young People to act as an impartial advocate of children’s rights, to ensure the implementation and systematic monitoring of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child, and to consider legislation and policy from the perspective of children and young people. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Andrew Wilson, Alasdair Morgan, Alex Neil, Irene McGugan, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Michael Russell*, Colin Campbell*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Fiona Hyslop*

S1M-447 Nicola Sturgeon: Commissioner for Children and Young People—That the Parliament calls for the establishment of the post of Commissioner for Children and Young People to act as an impartial advocate of children’s rights, to ensure the implementation and systematic monitoring of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child, and to consider legislation and policy from the perspective of children and young people. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Andrew Wilson, Alasdair Morgan, Alex Neil, Irene McGugan, Tommy Sheridan, Tricia Marwick, Michael Russell, Colin Campbell, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Michael Matheson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fiona Hyslop
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Robert Brown*
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Elaine Smith*
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Dr Winnie Ewing*, Mr John McAllion*

S1M-447 Nicola Sturgeon: Commissioner for Children and Young People-That the Parliament calls for the establishment of the post of Commissioner for Children and Young People to act as an impartial advocate of children's rights, to ensure the implementation and systematic monitoring of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child, and to consider legislation and policy from the perspective of children and young people. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Andrew Wilson, Alasdair Morgan, Alex Neil, Irene McGugan, Tommy Sheridan, Tricia Marwick, Michael Russell, Colin Campbell, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Michael Matheson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fiona Hyslop, Robert Brown, Elaine Smith, Dr Winnie Ewing, Mr John McAllion, Scott Barrie*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-447 Commissioner for Children and Young People (lodged on 20 January 2000) Trish Godman*

S1M-447 Nicola Sturgeon: Commissioner for Children and Young People—That the Parliament calls for the establishment of the post of Commissioner for Children and Young People to act as an impartial advocate of children’s rights, to ensure the implementation and systematic monitoring of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child, and to consider legislation and policy from the perspective of children and young people.
